column4: is there a way to automate updates?  Meaning, download and install all updates automatically?  As it stands, I just blindly click update anyway...  I know I could put it in a cronjob... is that the Ubuntu way of doing it, too?
go to System>Administration>Software Sources, you can set that up there.
I didn't ask *how*... I know that... I asked where the sum files are
it should be in the page linked.
